shake-up. Current Google CEO Eric Schmidt will serve as the company's executive chairman. Co-founder Sergey Brin will devote his time to strategic projects, in particular working on new products, the company said. We've been talking about how best to simplify our management structure and speed up decision making for a long time, Eric Schmidt said in a statement. This meant that Nokia had effectively surrendered the battle of platforms in the hope that Microsoft would prove a good gamble. The game has changed from a battle of devices to a war of ecosystems, Stephen Elop told reporters at a joint news conference with Microsoft CEO Steve Ballmer in London Friday. the clips released by CNN before the episode airs, the two made a bet about who can get controversial footballer Michael Vick on their show first. The bet came out of a question Piers Morgan asked Oprah: What advice would you give Michael Vick ? Oprah demurred, saying she was holding off on any advice because she was trying to get Michael Vick on her show. She added that she knew Piers Morgan was trying to book Michael Vick too. Oprah is

Philip Klein , a writer at the conservative American Spectator, explains the appeal for Mike Pence . There are a few factors driving talk of a Mike Pence presidential run. A regular speaker at tea parties, Mike Pence is one of a small number of elected Republicans with an appeal to economic, social and national security conservatives, he writes. pads designed by Unequal. "The Unequal technology is a part of my game now and I won't play without my Unequal," Michael Vick said in a statement, according to the Associated Press. Unequal's protective power gives me a whole new level of confidence in my game. It makes me feel invincible. Before serving 18 months in federal prison on charges related to his role in a dog fighting ring, Michael Vick was the National Football League's highest-paid player and one of the most desired endorsers in sports.
